title: (Champion suggestion) Dawn- The Anti Tank.
body:
Tanks are a eccentric in the game, to tank for the team in order to win. But some tanks are just unfair as the hp, armor and MR just overwhelms you. There are some almost unkillable tanks such as singed and rammus(just about his W 120armor and MR). Here is Dawn, made for countering tanks.
HP 494+79 6.3/5sec +0.85  
MP 290+63 4.4/5sec +0.67
AD 51.2+3.28 
Armor 20+2.03
MR 30+0
Speed 340
Melee
Passive: Armour Theft
Each basic attack steals 5/10/15/20 armour for 3.5sec stacks 3 times
Q: Stone Breaking Pierce. 55/60/65/70/75mp 8/7.9/7.8/7.7/7.6sec CD
Pierces enemies in a line (350range) , dealing 70%AD+15/40/70/105/145. +3%Max hp as magic damage.
Enemies are then marked with Broken Defences.
Broken Defences: enemies loose 6/7/8/9/10 armor for 2.5 seconds, attacking refreshes the duration and decreases armor by 1 everytime up to a maximum of 15/17/19/22/25.
W: Life Line 22/21.5/21/20.5/20sec 100mp
Selecting an enemy, marking them for Life transfer. Attacking them deals 1/1.75/2.5/3.25/4% of their max hp as bonus physical damage and heals for 1/1.75/2.5/3.25/4% of his own max hp. The Mark Lasts 5 sec.
E: Prepared Strike. 11/10.5/10/9.5/9 sec 70/75/80/85/90mp
Next basic attack will dash to an enemy within 425 range and has 100%Crit chance. as well as briefly stunning them for 0.33/0.44/0.55/0.66/0.77 sec if they are facing Dawn. If they turned their backs, they take 20/40/70/110/160 bonus damage and are shocked so reduces AD by 20/30/40/50/60 for 2.5 sec.
R: Totally Defenceless. 160/130/100 sec 150mp 650 cast range.
1 Champion is selected to reduce armour and MR by 50/100/150 for 2 sec before regaining them slowly over 5/10/15 seconds. After all armour has been regained, they then gain the buff Defence Leak, causing them to take 20/35/50 more damage from all sources for 3.5 sec after the effects wears off.
This champion is made to counter tanks with high armor, capable of reducing armor well below 0. Causing squishy targets to become squishier, tanky targets to not be tanky and totally ruining their tanks ability to absorb damage.
Upon reaching 3 stacks of passive is applied on a champion.
"You armour is breached"
"Break down"
"Drop your armour, soldier"
Upon Casting R on a champion.
"Your defences will crumble"
"So weak, how does this block damage?"
"Nothing will defend YOU from me"
"Put on more armour! Lets see how much will prevent me from killing you!"













The W TD passive is removed
W has been Remade.
Passive has beem remade.


"If those big guys think their defences are good; I will shred every single inch of it, oh yes i will"
                                                                                                                        -Dawn
